XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="PostAnalytics" displayName="PostAnalytics" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="Forum.Post" countMeasureName="%COUNT" countMeasureCaption="Посты" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0" disableListingGroups="false"> <dimension name="Tech" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Text" allDisplayName="Text" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Theme" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" sourceExpression="%cube.GetTech(%source.Text)" list="true" listDelimiter="," useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Posted" disabled="false" sharesFrom="TopicAnalytics" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Posted" allDisplayName="Posted" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> </dimension> <dimension name="Author" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Author" allDisplayName="Author" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" displayName="Все авторы" disabled="false"> <level name="Author" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Author" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" displayName="Зарегистрированные авторы" disabled="false"> <level name="ExtId" displayName="Автор" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.ExtId" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property name="Name" displayName="Автор" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Name" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </property> <property name="Location" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Location" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> <property name="Latitude" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Latitude" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> <property name="Longitude" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Longitude" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <listing name="New_listing1" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="Text,Link,Author,Posted,Topic->Name"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </listing> </cube>

Method.name: GetTech
Method.Implementation:
s text=$zconvert(text,"l") s res="" #define addtech(%tstr,%tech) if $F(text,%tstr) s $p(res,",",$I(i))=%tech w res,!
$$$addtech("cach","Cache") $$$addtech("ensemble","Ensemble") $$$addtech("iknow","iKnow") $$$addtech("deepsee","DeepSee") $$$addtech("gt.m","GT.M") if res="" s res="Другое" q res

Method.name: GetName
Method.Implementation: s author=##class(Forum.Post).%OpenId(id) if '$IsObject(author) q "" q author.Author
